The **mau** package is created to build and test decision models based in Multi Attribute Utility
Theory (MAUT). With this package you can automatically evalute utilities over a data.table of
indexes. Also, MAUT decision models are based in decision trees that could evaluated at every
level with **mau** and graph objects created with help of the igraph library.

## Installation
To instal **mau** you can proceed in the following way making use of the devtools library
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github( "pedroguarderas/mau" )
```
